name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Live long enough to see
On March 26, the official WeChat account of Beijing's private rare disease care organization "Hemophilia Home" announced that the center has decided to donate 100,000 yuan to Beijing for Beijing's construction. Donate 1 million yuan to the People's Republic of China for national construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, in front of the Zigong People's Government in Sichuan, people protested against the construction of a crematorium near their community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @lilipngchng2 Maybe it's because the country is sick

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 27, Xinhua, Hunan. Slogans such as "We need to eat, we need to survive" were hung on buses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, a student died at the Dongguan campus of Guangzhou Xinhua College, and parents protested their rights at the school gate that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
That night, a man in red was taken away by the police outside the new Apple store in Jing'an Temple.
When he was arrested, the man shouted, "What right do you have to take my phone?" "This is our right." "I am studying politics."
It is reported that the man tried to climb over the cordon before being arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, the topic "Sudden cliff-like salary cut" became a hot search on Weibo, and netizens shared their own experiences of cliff-like salary cuts and complained about them. As of now, the topic has been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In traditional Chinese culture, even bandits and bullies believe that their families and parents should not be harmed.
Frankly speaking, I am very shocked that the Chinese government uses such methods to attack and harass me. Such remarks have no meaning other than showing everyone your ugliness and viciousness.
You came to my parents and accused me of showing the "dark side" of China, but you showed the darkness to the fullest in my comment section.
👍🤌

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a "Statistical Table of Salaries in Civil Engineering Industries" has been circulated online. The table summarizes the welfare benefits, salary levels, and work intensity of major construction companies across the country. There are many companies that have delayed wages and often work overtime. For example, an employee of the Guangzhou branch of China Construction Fourth Engineering Bureau No. 1 Company reported that the company does not have a holiday all year round, is currently on standby, and only pays the minimum wage of 2,300 yuan in Guangzhou. An employee of China Railway Construction Investment reported that not only does the company not have a holiday all year round, but also has delayed wages for three months. An employee of an engineering consulting company said that the monthly salary is only 400 yuan and is often threatened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, in Shen County, Liaocheng, Shandong, the construction of Minsheng City Leading Show was left unfinished, and the owners put up banners outside the sales office to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 27, Luoyang, Henan. Retired employees protested outside the Luoyang branch of Zhongyuan Bank. It is reported that the bank was established by the Henan Provincial Government through an administrative order to merge the city commercial banks in various cities in Henan Province. These protesters are retired employees of the former Luoyang Bank. They came to defend their rights because their benefits were greatly reduced by Zhongyuan Bank after the merger. Not only retired employees, but also the benefits of the current employees of the original city banks were greatly reduced after the merger, and the workload and political studies increased significantly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 27, Pudong New District, Shanghai. Investors of Haiyin Wealth once again came to Haiyin headquarters at No. 8 Yincheng Middle Road to defend their rights.
Staff in "comprehensive management" uniforms formed a human wall to prevent investors from approaching the building, and some held black umbrellas to prevent filming.
The filmer pointed at an 80-year-old couple from Jiangxi and shouted to the human wall: What would you do if they were your parents?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 27, Beijing announced the abolition of the purchase restriction policy document that "households cannot purchase houses in Beijing within three years of divorce".
On August 4, 2021, the Beijing Housing and Urban-Rural Development Commission stipulated that if a couple in Beijing divorces, and the number of houses owned by the original family before the divorce does not meet the requirements of the city's commodity housing purchase restriction policy, neither party may purchase commodity housing in the city within three years from the date of divorce.
